title: Indian in Czech Republic extradited to USA in plotting the murder of Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Singh Pannun
selftext: Nikhil Gupta is currently lodged at the federal Metropolitan Detention Centre in Brooklyn, where he is listed as an inmate. The Washington Post was the first news outlet to report his extradition.
